```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r cars}
dismemberments <- read_csv("./Dismemberments_Barranquilla.csv")
```

## Graph 1

```{r}
#Add an indicator of competition or not
dismemberments <- dismemberments |> 
  mutate(competition = if_else(
    year == 2013 | year == 2016 | year == 2017 | 
      year == 2021 | year == 2022, 1, 0
   )) |> 
  relocate(competition, .after = year)
```

```{r}
graph1_black_ <- ggplot(dismemberments, aes(x = `function`, fill = `function`)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  labs(title = "Patterns of Dismemberments in Barranquilla, Colombia (2013-2022)",
       subtitle = "Grouped by Years with Criminal Hegemony or Inter-criminal Competition",
       x = NULL, 
       y = "Number of Dismemberments",
       fill = "Function") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    strip.background = element_rect(fill = "gray90", color = NA),
    strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", color = "black")
  ) +
  scale_fill_grey(start = 0.1, end = 0.7) +
  facet_wrap(~competition, 
             labeller = as_labeller(c(`0` = "Established criminal governance regime",
                                      `1` = "Inter-criminal competition")))

ggsave("dismemberment_graph.pdf", plot = last_plot(), width = 7, height = 5)
ggsave("dismemberment_graph.png", plot = last_plot(), width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 600)


```
